mapper.sql: select * from (select sr.role_id, sr.role_name, sr.remark, sr.create_at, group_concat(distinct srm.menu_id) as menuIdsString from system_role sr left join system_role_menu srm on sr.role_id = srm.role_id inner join system_menu sm on srm.menu_id = sm.menu_id group by sr.role_id, sr.role_name, sr.remark) t1 ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select * from (select count(*) from system_role sr left join system_role_menu srm on sr.role_id = srm.role_id inner join system_menu sm on srm.menu_id = sm.menu_id group by sr.role_id, sr.role_name, sr.remark) t1 ${ew.customSqlSegment}
mapper.select: select distinct su.username from system_user_role sur inner join system_user su on sur.user_id = su.user_id where role_id = #{roleId}
